title: Katie Price 'to star on gruelling reality series Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins'
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price has gone and signed up to the next series of Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins, according to reports.

Pricey has been teasing to fans that she's been training for a secret project, and it has now been claimed that the 41-year-old is gearing up to take part on the Channel 4 show.

Celebrities are given military training on Ant Middleton's hit show, so Katie will have to wave goodbye to her glamorous liefstyle if the rumours are true.

A source told The Sun: "Kate has been teasing fans about a secret project she's been training for. She's not supposed to tell anyone but as ever Pricey finds it hard to keep her mouth shut."

The former glamour model took to her YouTube channel last week to upload a video of herself training, admitting that it's hard.

(Image: YouTube)

(Image: You Tube / Katie Price)

She told fans: "I've got five weeks to go for this particular thing I'm training for. Now today when I go to the gym there's thing that I have to do like this training list.

"I have a fitness test on Wednesday and it evens involves doing a press up. Now I can't even do one press up, not even one, it's ridiculous.

"So with my trainer today, we've just got to go for the test and even reading the test it makes me feel sick."

(Image: YouTube)

She staggered out of the gym after battling a treadmill challenge, and she told Jack: "I am dying."

Love Island's Camilla Thurlow previously featured on the show, and was left defeated after slashing open her hand during a daring challenge.

The 29-year-old Scottish reality star was the last of 10 celebrities tasked with traversing a ravine (nicknamed the Devil’s throat) with a giant drop and crashing waterfall - with a metal ladder to be used like monkey bars to cross.

(Image: Channel 4)

After watching her fellow celebrities successfully pass the challenge, Camilla’s nerves began to seep through to the forefront of her mind.

The star - as well as the other contestants - had to sing across the metal ladder, pausing half way to follow orders to hang from the crossing one hand at a time.

But Camilla was defeated in the end.
description: The mum-of-five has reportedly signed up to Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins
